sub_title: Brave geek at heart empowering change, searching for remote/on-site colleagues | ESL & NT2 | NGO | Sustainability | Education & Edtech | Human Rights | Exploration | Together anything´s possible!
summary:
Education, sustainability & human rights: my three passions I want to combine for a better world, a world where we all, young and old, learn to be caretakers of this precious earth; a world where we care for those around us near or far.
Friendly. Educator. Analytical. Creative. Associational thinker. Proactive. Problem-solving. Connecting. Empowering. Reliable. Self-starter.

awards:
[{'title': "Praise for work on Peace Boat's 96th Oceania and 97th Asia voyage", 'description': 'From Eduardo Vila (GET Teacher's Coordinator) & Kanako Nakamura (GET Student's Coordinator):

" Congratulations on completing two succesful Peace Boat voyages as a GET Volunteer Language Teacher: Peace Boat's 96th Oceania voyage and 97th Asia Grand Cruise. For 106 days you have worked hard to make the voyage a success. Thanks to your dedication, enthusiasm, hard work and energy we have provided hundreds of participants with an unforgettable and rewarding experience. Through your efforts, you have directly contributed to making the Peace Boat experience an inspiring, international grassroots movement. Thanks to your guidance, many participants will continue to use communication and imagination to forge a more peaceful world.

Joris Boonekamp, Ooki-sensei! Ooki actually means 'great' and definitely you are great: a great person with a refined sense of humor; a great listener because you love spending time with people talking about deep topics; a great teacher because you make your students think about their lives;  a great free-hugger;  a great hiker of mountains, islands and volcanoes;  a great protector of your fellows and in the end, a great friend to have by one's side in every moment. We are also thankful for sharing all your passions and experience. Feel confident that you have inspired many people, especially your coordinator who is ready to do the Camino de Santiago because of you! Buena persona, buen, profesor, buen amigo,... Buen camino!"', 'issuer': 'GET Universal', 'date': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, {'title': "Praise for work on Peace Boat's 92nd global voyage", 'description': 'From Eduardo Vila (GET Teacher's Coordinator) & Keiko Ishida (GET Student's Coordinator):

"Congratulations on completing a succesful three and a half month journey around the world as a GET Volunteer Language Teacher on Peace Boat's 92nd global voyage. For 103 days you have worked hard to make the voyage a success.

Thoughful, genuine, cheerful and definitely the spice that the 92nd GET team needed. We will never forget one of the very first days onboard, still during orientation, when you took the mic and started to improvise. That performance sums up very well how you are: courageous, energetic, fun and spontaneous. When we saw you and your students interacting at the graduation ceremony and party, it was clear that they respected and truly appreciated your dedication to teaching them. But not only GET students, but also teachers and coordinators enjoyed every single moment that we spent together. We are filled with admiration for you because you know very well how to live a playful life."', 'issuer': 'GET Universal', 'date': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}]
